s0151: Wu Ling Wang made leather clothing, practiced riding and shooting, and the Zhao people followed him.
s0152: The Huns called him 'the flying Zhao'.
s0153: Wu Ling Wang had a favorite concubine named Wu Ying, who was treacherous and jealous.
s0154: The crown prince Zhang was born of the consort, but Wu Ying plotted to establish her son He as crown prince.
s0155: Wu Ling Wang grew old and became ill, Wu Ying and He plotted to kill the crown prince Zhang.
s0156: Zhang fled and entered the palace, hid in the beams.
s0157: Wu Ying sent people to search but could not find him.
s0158: Zhang's followers Zhao Jia and others plotted to kill Wu Ying.
s0159: Wu Ying became aware and fled, Zhang's followers pursued and killed Wu Ying.
s0160: Wu Ling Wang heard of it and was greatly angry, imprisoned Zhang in the Sanglin Palace, wanting to kill him.
s0161: The ministers all said Zhang was innocent, but the king would not listen.
s0162: Zhang's younger brother He feared being implicated, so plotted with Zhang's followers Cheng Drong and others to kill Zhang.
s0163: They entered the Sanglin Palace and killed Zhang.
s0164: Wu Ling Wang was greatly sad and buried Zhang with the rites of a crown prince.
s0165: Afterward, established He as crown prince.
s0166: Wu Ling Wang died, He ascended, this was Hui Wen Wang.
s0167: Hui Wen Wang was young, his mother Wu Ying had been killed by Zhang's followers, so the king hated Zhang's followers.
s0168: Cheng Drong and others feared punishment, so plotted rebellion, wanting to establish the crown prince's son Dai as king.
s0169: The plot leaked, the king killed Cheng Drong and others.
s0170: The crown prince feared and fled to the Qi border.
s0171: The king established younger brother Yong as crown prince.
s0172: Hui Wen Wang's mother was consort Meng Yao, who was favored.
s0173: Hui Wen Wang was born, consort Meng Yao died young.
s0174: Hui Wen Wang grew up, favored Li Ji.
s0175: Li Ji gave birth to son Dan.
s0176: Hui Wen Wang wanted to establish Dan as crown prince, but Yong was already established, so did not change it.
s0177: Hui Wen Wang died, Yong ascended, this was Xiao Cheng Wang.
s0178: Xiao Cheng Wang was young, Li Ji acted as regent.
s0179: Li Ji wanted to establish her son Dan as king, so plotted to kill Xiao Cheng Wang.
s0180: The plot was discovered, Li Ji was killed, Dan was killed.
s0181: Xiao Cheng Wang died without heir.
s0182: The noble Lian Po and Guo Kai established Xiao Cheng Wang's younger brother Yan as king, this was Daoxiang Wang.
s0183: Daoxiang Wang was young, Lian Po acted as regent.
s0184: Daoxiang Wang grew up, favored Guo Kai, disliked Lian Po.
s0185: Guo Kai plotted to drive away Lian Po.
s0187: Wei let Lian Po attack Zhao, Zhao defeated Wei.
s0188: Zhao then welcomed back Lian Po, restored his former position.
s0189: Daoxiang Wang died, son Xiaocheng Wang ascended.
s0190: Xiaocheng Wang favored Queen Zheng, who was treacherous.
s0191: Xiaocheng Wang died, son Huiwen Wang ascended.
s0192: Huiwen Wang's mother was Queen Zheng, who acted as regent.
s0193: Huiwen Wang died, son Xiaowen Wang ascended.
s0194: Xiaowen Wang died, son Huiwen Wang ascended.
s0195: Huiwen Wang died, son Zhao Wang ascended.
s0196: Zhao Wang was defeated by Qin, the state was lost, this was the end of Zhao.
s0197: Zhao Wang's younger brother Jia fled to Dai commandery.
s0198: Dai people established Jia as Zhao Jia Wang.
s0199: Zhao Jia Wang died, son Zhao Xie Wang ascended.
s0200: Zhao Xie Wang died, the Zhao lineage ended.
